## Making & Indexing data in R

### Vectors in R studio, not in physics bro

```{r}
dogs <- c("Teddy", 'Benjo')
typeof(dogs)
class(dogs)
```

```{r}
cats <- c(TRUE, 2)
typeof(cats)
```

```{r}
zipcodes <- c(44600, 53200, 93106)
as.character(zipcodes)
```
